rule: Only items that are compound words can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that have their vowels in alphabetical order can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are homophones of another English word can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are anagrams of a plant or animal species can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are palindromes can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are named after a person or place can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are associated with a famous event in history can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that can be typed using only the top row of a QWERTY keyboard can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that are synonyms of a word in a Beatles song title can be brought to the picnic.
Only items that can be represented in emoji form can be brought to the picnic.
